description.value:
With your extra hands, you can work with your hands more efficiently than others.
    When taking a Long Rest Action to work a trade based on using your hands, you can additionally take a Rest Action, getting more done in less time.
    In addition, for each hour spent working with your hands, you complete 1.5 hours of work. For example, an 8 hour task can be completed in 6 hours instead.
